document.full_text: parts of the wreckage of an air france plane found in the atlantic at the weekend contain the bodies of some of the passengers who died when the aircraft crashed off brazil in 2009, the french government said on monday.
document.title: france says finds bodies in atlantic crash wreckage
lines_and_colors: parts of the wreckage of an air france plane found in the atlantic at the weekend contain the bodies of some of the passengers who died when the aircraft crashed off brazil in 2009, the french government said on monday.
